info.title: Airslip API
info.description:
Airslip API enables financial institutions to get access to real-time financial risk data on small and medium sized businesses. 
                              
Financial institutions all assess risk differently and that is why we have built the platform so you get notified when only the risk you care about happens.

The Airslip API will help you:
                            
- Get access to financials such as balance sheets, cashflow statements, P&L and cash position.
                              
- Get notified when new invoices are uploaded to accounting systems within seconds.

- Get categorised bank transactions.

- Get categorised commerce transactions.

requestBody.description: The search model for assets. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

put.summary: Use this method to update assets.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the asset to update.

requestBody.description: The body of the asset to update.

post.summary: Use this method to create draft fixed assets.

requestBody.description: The body of the asset to create.

post.summary: Allows you to retrieve asset types.

requestBody.description: The search model for asset types. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

get.summary: Use this method to get an asset type.

put.summary: Use this method to update assets.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the asset type to update.

requestBody.description: The body of the asset type to update.

post.summary: Use this method to create asset types.

requestBody.description: The body of the asset type to create.

post.summary: Search for bank transactions for a connected business.

requestBody.description: The bank transaction model within the search query. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

get.summary: Get a singular bank transaction by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier for the bank transaction.

post.summary: Search for balances for a connected business.

requestBody.description: The account balance model within the search query. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

post.summary: Get all commerce transactions for a connected business.

requestBody.description: The commerce transaction model within the search query. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

post.summary: Allows you to search for employees.

requestBody.description: The search model for employees. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

get.summary: Use this method to get an employee.

put.summary: Use this method to update an employee.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the employee to update.

requestBody.description: The body of the employee to update.

post.summary: Use this method to create an employee.

requestBody.description: The body of the employee to create.

get.summary: The balance sheet report is a standard financial report which describes the financial position of an organisation at a point in time.

parameters.name: balanceDate
parameters.description: Specifies the date for balance sheet report.

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: The number of months to run the balance sheet for.

get.summary:
The statement of cash flows - direct method, provides the year to date changes in operating, financing and investing cash
flow activities for an organisation. Cashflow statement is not available in US region at this stage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the start date for cash flow report. If no parameter is provided, the date of 12 months before the end date will be used.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the end date for cash flow report. If no parameter is provided, the current date will be used.

get.summary: The profit and loss statement is a standard financial report providing detailed year to date income and expense detail for an organisation.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the start date for profit and loss report. If no parameter is provided, the date of 12 months before the end date will be used.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the end date for profit and loss report. If no parameter is provided, the current date will be used.

get.summary: Summarizes the total cash position for each account for an org.

parameters.name: balanceDate
parameters.description: The `balance date` will return transactions based on the accounting date entered by the user. Transactions before the balanceDate will be included.

post.summary: Use this method to retrieve one or many invoices.

requestBody.description: The invoice model within the search query. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model

post.summary: Use this method to create or update an invoice.

requestBody.description: The body of the invoice to update or create. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

post.summary: Create a webhook so you can get notified when a new event has occured.

requestBody.description: The body of the webhook to create. You can use this to sort or search for any column within the model.

url.description: The URL of the webhook endpoint.

secret.description: The endpoint’s secret, used to generate webhook signatures. Only returned at creation.

ApiKey.description:
e.g
Requests to the Airslip API are authenticated using the applications `Api_Key`. You can view and manage your credentials in the Airslip Dashboard.

An Api_Key provides connectivity to all authenticated Airslip API endpoints, so it is important to keep these credentials secure. Do not share your Api_Key in publicly accessible areas such as GitHub, client-side code, or easily accessible configuration settings.

Authentication is performed using ApiKey Authentication. Your Api_Key should be sent as the token.

All requests should be made via HTTPS.
ApiKey.name: Authorization

tags.name: Banking
tags.description:
A collection of banking APIs for a connected business.
You can use this API to retrieve bank transactions, categorised line by line merchant details, director information and account balances.

tags.name: Commerce
tags.description: A collection of APIs for commerce transactions after a connected business links at least one of its commerce, e-commerce, POS or marketplace accounts.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description:
You can configure webhook endpoints via the API to be notified about events that happen in for connected businesses.
Most users configure webhooks from the dashboard, which provides a user interface for registering and testing your webhook endpoints.

tags.name: Employees
tags.description: A collection of APIs that allows you to retrieve payroll for employees.

tags.name: Assets
tags.description: The Assets API exposes fixed asset related functions and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating assets, retrieving asset valuations and visualising asset depreciation.

tags.name: AssetTypes
tags.description: The Assets API exposes fixed asset related functions and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating assets, retrieving asset valuations and visualising asset depreciation.

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: Get, search, create and update invoices for a particular business.
